English: political street theater (loanword from Zhivaya Gazeta, or Living Newspaper, Russian theater form of the 1920s)

d.f: `以~`表演~`方式~`反映~`時事~`新聞~`的~`戲劇~。`可~`在~`街頭~`上~`或~`劇場~`中~`演出~。
